section_title: REPORTING FROM PARTIES NOT INCLUDED IN ANNEX I TO THE CONVENTION:
sentences: Information Contained in National Communications from Parties not Included in Annex I to the Convention: This item was held in abeyance.
Provision of Financial and Technical Support: This issue (FCCC/SBI/2014/INF.7) was first considered by the SBI on 4 June.

Robert Dixon, Global Environment Facility (GEF), informed delegates of the completion of the GEF's sixth replenishment process, with 30 donor countries pledging US$4.43 billion over the next four years, and GEF support of 31 countries to prepare their BURs.
This issue was further considered in informal consultations co-facilitated by Fatuma Mohamed Hussein and Helen Plume.
